ke.axle.chassis.utils

Class SharedMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • ke.axle.chassis.utils.SharedMethods

  • @Component
public class SharedMethods
extends Object
    Used to handle common functions. For example;
    • Parse javax errors in a List
    • Get system date in future to enforce locale
    • Write MultipartFile to file system
    • Get entity name for future release we will be able to get the database name
    • Encrypt and decrypt text using a default key
    • Retrieve the ID of an entity
    • Get a List of generic parameters of a generic class
    Version:
    0.0.1, 1.2.3
    Author:
    Cornelius M, Owori Juma
